yourRights.title: When am I entitled to compensation?
yourRights.process.compensation: Compensation covers delays, cancellations and denied boarding
yourRights.process.delay: Applies to delays of 2-3 hours or more (depending on flight distance)
yourRights.process.eligibility: Flight must depart from or arrive in the EU, or the airline must be based in the EU
yourRights.process.period: Claims can be made for the last 3 years
yourRights.process.exceptions: Exceptions possible for delays due to extraordinary circumstances
faq.title: How can we help?
faq.lead: Do you have questions? We are here to help.
faq.not_found: Your question is not listed? Give us a call or send us an email!
status.paymentProcessed.title: Payment Processed
demandLetter.title: Demand Letter for Booking {bookingNumber}
demandLetter.introduction: We are claiming rights under Regulation (EC) No. 261/2004 for the flight {iata} from {departure} to {arrival} due to {disruption} on behalf of the passenger. The flight details are as follows:
demandLetter.assignment: The claim has been assigned to us by the passenger {name}. We are now the rightful claimant. The assignment agreement is attached. All further correspondence must be directed to us exclusively. Payments to the passenger are not permitted and must be made solely to our account.
demandLetter.claim: The claim amounts to {amount}. We hereby demand payment of the amount of {amount} to be transferred to our account {iban} no later than {due}.
demandLetter.extraordinaryCircumstances: If you claim extraordinary circumstances, we ask you to provide corresponding evidence now. If you believe you are not the correct respondent for the claim, you will be asked to provide justification or evidence accordingly.
demandLetter.lawsuit: If you do not comply with the payment demand, we will file a lawsuit without further notice.
assignmentLetter.title: Assignment Agreement
assignmentLetter.main: I, {addressBlock} hereby declare that I assign my claim for compensation under Regulation (EC) No. 261/2004 regarding flight {flight} {airports} to {rightsPlus}, unconditionally and irrevocably.
assignmentLetter.compensation: The assignor will receive payment for their claim according to the currently valid terms and conditions as well as the price list.
assignmentLetter.claimant: The assignor declares to be the rightful claimant at the time of the assignment.
assignmentLetter.declaration: {rightsPlus}, represented by the managing director {partner}, hereby accepts the assignment.

assignmentAgreement.title: Assignment Agreement
assignmentAgreement.description: To be able to pursue your claim in court if necessary, you must assign the claim to us
fightingForYourRights: With {partner}, we enforce your compensation claims according to EU law.

summary.subtitle: With RightsPlus, we enforce your claims according to EU law.

check.title: Check Compensation Claim
check.description: Based on flight route and date

feeCalculator.title: Compensation Amount and Fee
feeCalculator.description: Our fee depends on your compensation. We only get paid if you receive compensation. This means we are committed and motivated to secure high compensation for you. This way, we both benefit.

reviews.title: RightsPlus Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Our customers speak for themselves! Over 500 satisfied users have already relied on the simple and effective compensation claims process through RightsPlus.

cta.title: Secure your deserved compensation
cta.subtitle: With our simple online check, you can quickly and easily verify your compensation claims. And the best part: It's free and non-binding.

professionalExpertise.title: Professional Expertise
professionalExpertise.description:
You benefit from our professional expertise and experience in this field. We offer you a competent service and place great emphasis on efficient and transparent work.
Our success rate is 98% for the claims we process. For effective and successful enforcement of claims, we work closely with a law firm specializing in travel law.

completeProcess.title: Complete Process
completeProcess.description:
We handle the entire process independently. You only need to transfer the respective claim to us. Of course, we keep you updated on the current status at all times.
By engaging us, you not only save yourself frustrating and time-consuming correspondence with airlines that often doesn't lead to the desired success, but also any legal fees and associated litigation risks that may arise.

noRisk.title: No Cost & Process Risk
noRisk.description:
You bear no cost or process risk. There are no hidden costs or risks.
Only in the case of successful enforcement of the claim do we receive a proportional fee of 25% (incl. VAT). In this regard, we refer to our price and service list.

compensationBanner.claimUpToExtended: Claim up to {amount} for your delayed or cancelled flight!
